revisions.rev:
{{Distinguish|List of Microsoft Windows components}} The following is a list of notable Microsoft software applications.
==Development tools== * [[Visual Studio]] * [[Visual Studio Express]] * [[WebMatrix]]
==Digital media authoring== * [[AutoCollage 2008]] * [[Microsoft Expression Studio]] ** [[Microsoft Expression Web]] ** [[Microsoft Expression Blend]] ** [[Microsoft Expression Encoder]] ** [[Microsoft Expression Media]] * [[Windows Live Movie Maker]] * [[Windows Media Encoder]]
==Internet== * [[Bing Bar]] * [[Internet Explorer]] <!-- It is pretty much a Windows component but it has out-of-band versions too, like IE9. Therefore, it deserves being here. --> * [[Microsoft Messenger for Mac]] * [[Microsoft Silverlight]] * [[Windows Live Essentials]] ** [[Windows Live Family Safety]] ** [[Windows Live Mail]] ** [[Windows Live Mesh]] ** [[Windows Live Messenger]] ** [[Windows Live Writer]]
==Office== * [[Microsoft Access]] * [[Microsoft Entourage]] * [[Microsoft Excel]] * [[Microsoft FrontPage]] * [[Microsoft InfoPath]] * [[Microsoft Lync]] * [[Microsoft MapPoint]] * [[Microsoft Office Picture Manager]] * [[Microsoft Office shared tools]] * [[Microsoft OneNote]] * [[Microsoft Outlook]] * [[Microsoft PowerPoint]] * [[Microsoft Project]] * [[Microsoft Publisher]] * [[Microsoft SharePoint Workspace]] * [[Microsoft Visio]] * [[Microsoft Word]] * [[Microsoft Works]] * [[Office Assistant]] * [[Outlook Web Access]]
=== [[Microsoft Office]] suites === * [[Microsoft Office 3.0]] * [[Microsoft Office 95]] * [[Microsoft Office 97]] * [[Microsoft Office 2000]] * [[Microsoft Office XP]] * [[Microsoft Office 2003]] * [[Microsoft Office 2007]] * [[Microsoft Office 2010]] * [[Microsoft Office 98 Macintosh Edition]] * [[Microsoft Office 2001]] * [[Microsoft Office v. X]] * [[Office 2004 for Mac]] * [[Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac]] * [[Microsoft Office for Mac 2011]]
== Operating systems == {{Details|List of Microsoft operating systems}} * [[MS-DOS]] * [[Microsoft Windows]] ** [[Windows NT]] ** [[Windows CE]] ** [[Windows Embedded]] ** [[Windows Mobile]] ** [[Windows Phone]] ** [[Windows Preinstallation Environment]] ** [[Windows Server]]
==[[Microsoft Servers|Server software]]== * [[Microsoft BizTalk Server]] * [[Microsoft Commerce Server]] * [[Microsoft CRM]] * [[Microsoft Dynamics]] * [[Microsoft Exchange Server]] * [[Microsoft Exchange]] * [[Microsoft Forecaster]] * [[Microsoft Forefront]] ** [[Forefront Identity Manager]] ** [[Forefront Online Protection for Exchange]] ** [[Forefront Protection for Exchange Server]] ** [[Forefront Protection for SharePoint Server]] ** [[Forefront Protection Server Management Console]] ** [[Forefront Threat Management Gateway]] ** [[Forefront Unified Access Gateway]] * [[Microsoft FRx]] * [[Microsoft Lync Server]] * [[Microsoft Office Project Server]] * [[Microsoft SharePoint]] * [[Microsoft Small Business Financials]] * [[Microsoft SQL Server]] * [[Microsoft System Center]] * [[Microsoft Virtual Server]]
==System Administration== * [[Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack]] * [[Microsoft Security Essentials]] * [[Windows To Go|Portable Workspace Creator]] * [[Windows Defender]] * [[Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack]] * [[Windows PowerShell]] * [[Windows SteadyState]] * [[Winternals]] utilities ** [[Process Explorer]] ** [[Process Monitor]] ** [[PageDefrag]] ** [[RootkitRevealer]]
==Video games== {{Main|Microsoft Game Studios}} * [[Age of Empires]] series * [[Freelancer (video game)|Freelancer]] * [[Halo (series)|Halo]] series * [[Microsoft Flight Simulator]] series * [[Midtown Madness (series)|Midtown Madness]] series * [[Rise of Nations]] * [[Train Simulator]]
==Misc.== * [[Microsoft Mathematics]] * [[Microsoft Reader]] * [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] <!-- Until Windows 7, it was not a Windows component. Therefore, it deserves being here. --> * [[Ribbon Hero 2]] * [[Windows Live Photo Gallery]] * [[Windows Media Player]] <!-- It is a Windows component but it has out-of-band versions too. Therefore, it deserves being here. --> * [[WorldWide Telescope]]
== Discontinued == {{See also|:Category:Discontinued Microsoft software}} * [[Creative Writer]] * [[Encarta]] * [[Internet Explorer for Mac]] * [[Microsoft Agent]] * [[Microsoft Anti-Virus]] * [[Microsoft Binder]] * [[Microsoft Bob]] * [[Microsoft Comic Chat]] * [[Microsoft Digital Image]] * [[Microsoft Liquid Motion]] * [[Microsoft Money]] * [[Microsoft Picture It!]] * [[Microsoft Plus!]] * [[Microsoft PowerToys]] * [[Microsoft Schedule Plus]] * [[Microsoft Student]] * [[Microsoft Vizact 2000]] * [[Windows Live OneCare]]
==See also== * [[List of Microsoft topics]] {{Microsoft products}} {{MSN services}}
